summary: As a young woman prepares a memorial film retrospective for her late estranged father, his work begins to influence her life in strange and significant ways.
cast: Lauren Lee Smith|Jennifer Beals|Ben Cotton|Sarah Grey|Katharine Isabelle|Kett Turton|Viv Leacock|Gabrielle Rose|Jerry Wasserman|Erica Carroll|Kristine Cofsky|Chad L. Coleman|Cheryln Cortes|Brad Dryborough|Geoff Gustafson|Michelle Kim|Wesley Salter|Andrea Stefancikova|Joel Sturrock|Catherine Michaud|Johnny Barratt|Daniel Boileau|Mark Ghanimé|Adam Lolacher|Casey Manderson|Cynthia Potvin|Andréa Vawda
title: Cinemanovels
